values: 车轮；轮子；机轮；（汽车等的）方向盘；转轮；（游戏的）转盘；（飞机的）起落架轮；（船舶的）舵轮；（纺织的）纺轮；（陶艺的）制陶轮；（军事的）转向运动；（体操的）轮式动作
旋转；转动；打转；推动（带轮子的物体）；盘旋（如鸟类）；围绕；用车运输；使迅速转身；猛然转身；改变方向；驾驶（车辆）；操纵（方向盘）

synonym.mean: 转动；使变换方向；给…装轮子
旋转；突然转变方向；盘旋飞行

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 滚动；装轮子（wheel的过去分词）

word_group.brief_definition: 方向盘后面；驾驶, 开车
错综复杂的情况, 盘根错节
重复发明, 无谓地重复, 浪费时间做无用功
备用轮；连接轮；多余的人；累赘；野营挂车；转向轮
冕形齿轮；差动器侧伞齿轮
要人，显赫人物；费里斯转轮

bilingual.source: This was no doubt the reason behind the invention of the wheel in ancient times.
bilingual.target: 这无疑是古代发明车轮的原因。
他正在修理汽车的车轮。

bilingual.source: The wheel of this bicycle is broken.
bilingual.target: 这辆自行车的车轮坏了。

bilingual.source: The wheel slipped on the muddy road.
bilingual.target: 车轮在泥泞的路上打滑。
这辆自行车的车轮有32根辐条。

bilingual.source: The wheel crush down the glass on the ground.
bilingual.target: 车轮碾碎了地上的玻璃。

bilingual.source: We need to replace the shopping cart's wheel.
bilingual.target: 我们需要更换购物车的车轮。

bilingual.source: The spokes of the wheel are arranged radially.
bilingual.target: 车轮的辐条是径向地排列的。

bilingual.source: The wheel started to wobble due to eccentric force.
bilingual.target: 由于偏心力，车轮开始摇晃。

bilingual.source: The spokes provide structural support to the wheel.
bilingual.target: 辐条为车轮提供了结构支撑。

list.abstract: wheel，中文意思是轮子; 旋转。

yingyinNormal.en: Look at the steering wheel, look.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你看这个方向盘。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《大卫·贝克汉姆：探索未知之境》

yingyinNormal.en: Ring the bell. Turn that wheel. Aye aye, Captain Peppa. Jump up and down.
yingyinNormal.zh: 敲响铃铛，转动轴轮。好的，佩奇船长。在船上跳来跳去。

yingyinNormal.en: No, the Sex Pistols have potential. This is the wheel. It's the industrial revolution.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，性手枪（乐队）才被说成是有潜力的东西，这是个轮子会引发一场工业革命的轮子。

yingyinNormal.en: Daddy pig and George are riding on the big wheel. Hold tight now. That really is high.
yingyinNormal.zh: 猪爸爸和乔治正坐在摩天轮上。好，抓紧了。这真是太高了。

yingyinNormal.en: The massive wheel is over 400 feet high, and takes 30 minutes to complete one rotation.
yingyinNormal.zh: 巨大的摩天轮超过 400 呎高，在转一圈需时30分钟。

yingyinNormal.en: Night of the party, the car's empty, and a week later, the dead boy's found at the wheel.
yingyinNormal.zh: 派对当晚，车子是空的，一周后男孩的尸体就在驾驶座上。

yingyinNormal.en: Maybe Tony's right. If, we have one hand on the wheel we can still steer. If we take it off...
yingyinNormal.zh: 或许托尼是对的，如果我们稍作妥协，就还有回旋余地，但如果彻底决裂……

yingyinNormal.en: I mean, they didn't say anything, but I just kind of felt like I was being a weird third wheel.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的意思是，他们虽然什么都没说，但我却觉得自己有点像奇怪的电灯泡。

yingyinNormal.en: Where's the chief mechanic? Here I am. What do we do? Put the wheel back on. OK, chief mechanic.
yingyinNormal.zh: 总机械师在哪里？我在这。我们在干什么？把轮子放回去。好的，总机械师。

yingyinNormal.en: The rating agencies, the banks, the fucking government, you're saying they're all asleep at the wheel?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是说评级机构，银行和狗屁政府都坐视不管吗？

yingyinNormal.en: That's the end of Lap two and George is still in the lead. Oh, dear. A wheel has come off George's car.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是第二圈的终点，乔治还在领先。哦，天哪，一个轮子从乔治的车上掉下来了。

yingyinNormal.en: Next, we need a steering wheel. Last of all, you need racing goggles and a hat. It's George's racing car.
yingyinNormal.zh: 下一个，我们需要一个方向盘。最后，你需要赛车护目镜和一个帽子。这是乔治的赛车。

yingyinNormal.en: But later it won't be soft. Mummy Zebra is making a little cup on the potter's wheel. There, one cup. Wow.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不过一会他们就会变硬了。斑马妈妈在逃一转盘上面转出了一个茶杯。好了，一个茶杯。哇。

yingyinNormal.en: Ah, it's all gone wrong. Making a cup on a potter's wheel is not easy. There is an easier way to make a cup.
yingyinNormal.zh: 啊，全部都弄糟了怎么办。在陶艺转盘上做一个茶杯一点都不容易。有一个简单的方法做一个茶杯。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm almost 50 years old. I've been in the passenger seat for decades. It's time for me to get behind the wheel.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我快要年过半百了，几十年来我一直当你的贤内助，也该让我自主一回了。

yingyinNormal.en: Also, tonight's the Sabbath and my mother and I have a tradition of lighting the candles and watching Wheel of Fortune.
yingyinNormal.zh: 还有，今晚是安息日，我妈和我的传统是点亮蜡烛，一起看《幸运之轮》。

yingyinNormal.en: You don't have three-wheel brakes, so you got to pitch it hard, break it loose and then just drive it with the throttle.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在泥地里煞车没用，你不能踩煞车，你得用油门来控制，过弯时记得放油门

yingyinNormal.en: When George was a baby, we used to put him in his pram and wheel him around the house. And that always sent him to sleep.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当乔治还是小宝宝的时候。我们会把它放在婴儿车里然后围着屋子不停转圈。这个办法总是能让她睡着。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, yes. That old thing is taking quite a bit of time. Mind you, there wasn't much left to work on. Only a steering wheel.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对了，这个老东西花了我们不少时间，提醒你下，剩下的都不能用了，只剩个方向盘。

yingyinNormal.en: George! Raise the flag! Peppa! Ring the bell! Aye-aye, Captain! Granny Pig! Take the wheel! Aye-aye, Captain! Full sail! Full sail!
yingyinNormal.zh: 乔治！把旗子升起来！佩琪！敲响铃铛！是的！船长！猪奶奶！你来掌舵！是的船长。全速前进。全速前进。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 轮子; 齿轮; 机轮

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: push an object that has wheels

sense_info_list.zh: 轮子; 齿轮; 机轮

sense_info_list.en: turn quickly or suddenly and face the opposite direction; make someone or something do this

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.zh: 轮子; 齿轮; 机轮

examination_example.sentence: He is building a four-<highlight>wheeled</highlight> robot that will run on solar and electric power.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他正在制造一个依靠太阳能和电力运行的四轮机器人。

examination_example.sentence: The vehicle-named the Transition – has two seats, four <highlight>wheels</highlight> and wings that fold up so it can be driven like a car.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这款名为“过渡号”的车有两个座位、四个轮子和一对机翼，机翼折叠起来后就可以像汽车一样行驶。

examination_example.sentence: We hope that our work will help with technological solutions (解决方案) to ensure that older drivers stay safer behind the <highlight>wheel</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们希望我们的工作将有助于技术解决方案，以确保高龄驾驶人在驾驶时更安全。

sense_info_list.zh: (set the wheels in motion)开展; 实施

examination_example.sentence: I'm so glad I set the <highlight>wheels</highlight> of change in motion with that very small first step.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我很高兴我迈出了很小的第一步，让改变的车轮转动起来。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: It can move on <highlight>wheels</highlight>, walk on legs or be driven by small engines (发动机).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它可以用轮子移动，用腿行走，或者由小型发动机驱动。

examination_example.sentence: They find no driver and the steering <highlight>wheel</highlight> (方向盘) turning slowly itself.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们发现没有司机，方向盘自己在慢慢地转动。air

examination_example.sentence: Some students pull <highlight>wheeled</highlight> bags filled with heavy textbooks and others carry backpacks.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些学生拖着装满沉重课本的轮式书包，还有一些学生背着背包。
